SEARCH
Package com.smarthome.devices

Class Device

java.lang.Object
com.smarthome.devices.Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
AirConditioner
@Component public class Device extends Object
The Device class represents a smart home device with various attributes such as device name, type, group, location, power status, battery level, and power consumption.

    • Device

      @Autowired public Device(String deviceName, DeviceType.DeviceTypeEnum deviceType, DeviceGroup.DeviceGroupEnum deviceGroup, DeviceLocation.DeviceLocationEnum location, Boolean isTurnedOn, double batteryLevel, double powerConsumption, int maxBatteryCapacity, int powerLevel)
      Constructor to initialize a new Device object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the name of the device
      deviceType - the type of the device
      deviceGroup - the group to which the device belongs
      location - the location of the device
      isTurnedOn - the power status of the device
      batteryLevel - the current battery level of the device
      powerConsumption - the power consumption of the device
      maxBatteryCapacity - the maximum battery capacity of the device
      powerLevel - the current power level of the device
